welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Seaford, UK! Prepare to be enchanted by our charming seaside town known for its beautiful beaches, stunning cliffs, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Seaford has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Shoreham Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Shoreham Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the airport's main terminal, serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Gatwick Airport primarily serves international flights, with a smaller section dedicated to domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redhill Aerodrome Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Redhill Aerodrome Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.
